channel.title: Apache Cxf on htr3n's
channel.link:
https://htr3n.github.io/tags/apache-cxf/Recent content in Apache Cxf on htr3n'sHugo -- gohugo.ioenThis work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.Fri, 15 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000 A journey from Apache CXF 2.2 to 3.2https://htr3n.github.io/2018/06/apache-cxf-2-to-3/Fri, 15 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/06/apache-cxf-2-to-3/

I have used Apache CXF 2.2 to develop Web services for some R&D projects that I took part in. At that time, it was a choice between Apache Axis/Axis2 and CXF (formerly Codehaus XFire project).
